title: This is why I hate living in Colorado ATM
body:
5/18/2017 -- went to bed last night with a thunderstorm, woke up to the ground covered in 3+ inches of snow and still snowing hard.  IN THE MIDDLE OF MAY!  Thank goodness we brought my flower pots in so my flowers won't die, but comeon.  I just came from gorgeous 70-80 degree sunny days in Maryland to this rubbish nonsense.  Why do people like living here?  I keep getting told "it'll get better!" but it's just awful rubbish cold and dead!

/rant
